Name: Forest's Curse
Effect: Single Target. Add the Grass Type to the Target's Type. (ie Pikachu will now be "Electric/Grass", Charizard will not be "Fire/Flying/Grass") If the Target already has a third Type attached, replace it.
Description: The user lays the forest’scurse upon the target, causing roots and branches to grow on its body until they are a haunted tree. Perform an exorcism or get to a Pokémon Center ASAP
